jobDescription: JOB TITLE: Business Intelligence AnalystLOCATION: Lisle, ILREPORTING TO: Director, Thought LeadershipCOMPANY OVERVIEW As a global leader in cash technology solutions, we provide the financial, retail, cash centre and gaming industries with confidence that their cash is protected and always working to help build a stronger business.  Our cash automation technologies and process engineering services help businesses in more than 100 countries optimise the handling, movement and management of cash. While we span the globe, we personally engage with each customer to address their unique challenges and goals — enhancing staff efficiency, reducing operating costs and enabling a more rewarding customer experience.  We offer peace of mind. We enable transformation. We generate options. We empower people. We do all this by releasing companies from the burden of cash management, putting cash to work, and helping customers enhance the value that their staff and facilities add to their business ROLE PURPOSE The Business Intelligence Analyst is responsible for supporting the business in planning and developing business strategies and key initiatives through market analysis, competitive business analysis and strategy development. This role will also support the broader leadership team as necessary to ensure the success of priority business initiatives. MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES The role is characterized by two main areas of responsibility: Review current vertical markets from a geographic perspective, identifying overall potential, local market drivers, decision-making behaviours/motivators and recommending product strategies for these markets, co- ordinating with Product Management and Planning for products and with the Thought Leadership and Marketing teams for go-to-market activities (sales training, sales collaterals, indirect marketing activities, etc.)Evaluating potential new vertical markets, leading efforts to understand market potentials, our best go-to-market strategies and our best product opportunities. Partnering with the Thought Leadership and Innovation and Strategic Alliances teams to build new business pillars; co-ordinate and lead external consulting engagements in the market discovery process. Key responsibility for specific tracks of work including the compilation of market trends and research, business analysis (e.g., synthesis of business, competitive and market driver data, financial analyses, construction of business cases), business modelling and other strategic planning activities as needed.
